description:
My Allergy Translator is the app for people travelling with food allergies.

Want to eat that dish everyone else in the resort has tried in Spain? Enjoy food from a market stall? Want to help let your children eat what they want? In just two clicks you have an instant translation, helping you enjoy the food you want to, without the worry of not knowing what's in the ingredients.

Take away the hassle of "Allergy translation cards", the app has 99 translations for various allergies and languages, and we will be adding more soon. 

All translations are stored locally just download the app at home then use without the worry of roaming charges abroad.

Current Allergies:
- Dairy, Eggs, Fish, Milk, Nuts, Peanuts, Shellfish, Soybeans, Wheat

Current Languages:
- English, French, Spanish, Dutch, German, Irish, Italian, Turkish, Portuguese, Finnish, Swedish

Need a allergy/language not already in the app? Please let us know within the app - we will try to include all requests within the next update!
